patthana1.12:1.1_0: Sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—sekkhaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…

patthana1.12:114.1_2: jhāne magge sampayutte vippayutte atthiyā natthiyā vigate avigate ekaṁ.
patthana1.12:117.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:118.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:119.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—sekkhā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.12:121.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—nevasekkhanāsekkhā hetū
patthana1.12:121.1_1: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:122.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.12:123.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— arahā asekkhaṁ phalaṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.12:124.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ
patthana1.12:124.1_8: Ariyā pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.12:124.1_15: vatthuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
patthana1.12:125.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— nibbānaṁ maggassa,
patthana1.12:126.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— nibbānaṁ asekkhassa phalassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:127.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:128.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.12:128.1_2: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.12:129.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:129.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—sekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:130.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:131.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.12:132.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:132.1_1: **Sahajātādhipati**—asekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:133.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇādhipati,
patthana1.12:133.1_2: **Ārammaṇādhipati**—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ katvā taṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.12:133.1_4: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ garuṁ katvā paccavekkhati,
patthana1.12:133.1_12: vatthuṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhe khandhe garuṁ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
patthana1.12:133.1_15: **Sahajātādhipati**—nevasekkhanāsekkhādhipati sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:134.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:135.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:136.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā sekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.12:136.1_3: sekkhaṁ phalaṁ sekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:137.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—maggo asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:138.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— sekkhaṁ phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:139.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ
patthana1.12:139.1_2: Asekkhaṁ phalaṁ asekkhassa phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:140.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— asekkhaṁ phalaṁ vuṭṭhānassa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:141.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā
patthana1.12:142.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.12:142.1_3: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalaṁ sekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:143.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— anulomaṁ asekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā …
patthana1.12:143.1_1: nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakiriyaṁ asekkhāya phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:144.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo …pe…. (Anantarasadisaṁ, aṭṭha pañhā.)
patthana1.12:145.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:146.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:146.1_3: Dutiyo maggo tatiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:146.1_4: Tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:147.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— anantarūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:148.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:148.1_10: Sekkhā phalasamāpatti kāyikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:149.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:149.1_1: **Anantarūpanissayo**—purimā purimā asekkhā khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ asekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:149.1_2: asekkhaṁ phalaṁ asekkhassa phalassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:150.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:151.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:151.1_29: Paṭhamassa jhānassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:151.1_31: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ dutiyassa jhānassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:152.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:152.1_3: **Pakatūpanissayo**—paṭhamassa maggassa parikammaṁ paṭhamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:152.1_4: catutthassa maggassa parikammaṁ catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:153.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo— ārammaṇūpanissayo,
patthana1.12:154.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo—ārammaṇapurejātaṁ,
patthana1.12:155.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:156.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:157.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā sekkhā khandhā
patthana1.12:158.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo— pacchājātā asekkhā khandhā
patthana1.12:159.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo—pacchājātā nevasekkhanāsekkhā
patthana1.12:159.1_1: khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:160.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo—purimā purimā nevasekkhanāsekkhā
patthana1.12:160.1_1: khandhā pacchimānaṁ pacchimānaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ āsevanapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:161.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo— gotrabhu maggassa …
patthana1.12:162.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.12:162.1_3: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—sekkhā cetanā vipākānaṁ sekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:163.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:164.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:165.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ
patthana1.12:166.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:167.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:168.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—asekkhā cetanā
patthana1.12:168.1_1: sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:169.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo—sahajātā,
patthana1.12:169.1_2: **Sahajātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:169.1_4: **Nānākkhaṇikā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā cetanā vipākānaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhānaṁ khandhānaṁ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṁ kammapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:170.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:171.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—asekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:172.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vipākapaccayena paccayo—vipāko nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe…
patthana1.12:173.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:174.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:174.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:175.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:176.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:176.1_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṁ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:176.1_10: **Pacchājātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:177.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:178.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:179.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ …pe….
patthana1.12:180.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo— sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:180.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:181.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sekkho eko khandho
patthana1.12:181.1_1: tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:182.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe… tīṇi. (Sekkhasadisaṁ.)
patthana1.12:183.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:183.1_3: **Sahajāto**—nevasekkhanāsekkho eko khandho tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:183.1_25: **Pacchājātā**—nevasekkhanāsekkhā khandhā purejātassa imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:184.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:185.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:186.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:186.1_2: **Sahajāto**—sekkho eko khandho ca vatthu ca tiṇṇannaṁ khandhānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo …pe…
patthana1.12:187.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo—sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:187.1_2: **Sahajātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca mahābhūtā ca cittasamuṭṭhānānaṁ rūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:187.1_3: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca imassa kāyassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:187.1_4: **Pacchājātā**—sekkhā khandhā ca rūpajīvitindriyañca kaṭattārūpānaṁ atthipaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:188.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo …pe….
patthana1.12:189.1_13: vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta,
patthana1.12:191.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:192.1_0: Sekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:193.1_0: Sekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:194.1_0: Sekkho dhammo sekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:195.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:196.1_0: Asekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:197.1_0: Asekkho dhammo asekkhassa ca nevasekkhanāsekkhassa ca dhammassa sahajātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.12:198.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:199.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo sekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:200.1_0: Nevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo asekkhassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo …
patthana1.12:201.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā sekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:202.1_0: Sekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:203.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā asekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ, purejātaṁ.
patthana1.12:204.1_0: Asekkho ca nevasekkhanāsekkho ca dhammā nevasekkhanāsekkhassa dhammassa sahajātaṁ,
patthana1.12:207.1_5: naupanissaye napurejāte napacchājāte naāsevane nakamme satta,
patthana1.12:209.1_12: vipāke āhāre indriye jhāne magge satta,
